titles: Than is there an other yle ye men call Dodye
author: Mandeville, John, Sir.
Jean, d'Outremeuse, 1338-ca. 1399, attributed name.
notes: Attributed to John Mandeville, but in fact an English version of a text known as "Itinerarium". The original was probably written in Anglo-Norman French and has been attributed to Jean d'Outremeuse.
Title from first line of text.
Imperfect; lacks all before leaf lxxii and all after leaf Cii.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Voyages and travels --  Early works to 1800.
